answer.p: blojsom is an acronym for (blo)gging in (j)ava ... (so)mewhat ... (m)aybe. I was looking for a way to play off the name, blosxom, blojsom's not-so-distant "relative", and blojsom stuck.
Phonetically, I guess it would be bloj-sum.

faq.question: Can blojsom support more than one user with a single blojsom installation?

answer.p: Yes. As of blojsom 2.0, blojsom is multi-user enabled.

faq.question: How do I create my first blog entry?

answer.p: blojsom renders your blog based on what files it finds in the directory you set as your blog-home (see installation). In this directory, each individual file is treated as a seperate blog entry. You can control which files are processed and which are ignored using the blog-file-extentions and blog-directory-filter entries in /WEB-INF/(user-id)/blog.properties.

faq.question: How do I create different blog categories?

answer.p: All you have to do is simply create new directories underneath your blog-home directory and blojsom will automatically recognize them as categories. You can further control the categories using optional meta-data, an example is a more descriptive name for the category. See customization for more details.

faq.question: I hear a lot about moblogging ... is it supported in any way by blojsom?

answer.p: Yes. Well, there are different ways to support moblogging and with blojsom, you can use blojsim, an instant messenger add-on for blojsom to blog via AIM, Jabber, or MSN.
You may also download the pop2blog plugin for blojsom. This plugin will monitor a POP3 mailbox and post blog entries to the appropriate category.

faq.question: Besides blojsim, is there any other support for moblogging?

answer.p: Eventually, we will get around to writing an e-mail interface so that you can send e-mail to a mailbox that blojsom will monitor and populate your blojsom blog with the content.

faq.question: Can I edit my blojsom blog via XML-RPC?

answer.p: Yes. blojsom includes an XML-RPC servlet and XML-RPC handlers for the Blogger API and the MetaWeblog API.

faq.question: Are there any extensions available for blojsom?

answer.p: Yes. In fact there is one (at the moment). Check out blojsim, which is an instant messenger add-on for blojsom. Using blojsim, you can blog directly to blojsom from your mobile phone or any other IM-capable device.

faq.question: What plugins are available for blojsom?

answer.p: As blojsom users write plugins for blojsom, we will maintain a list of plugins for blojsom. Starting with blojsom 1.4, there are a number of plugins available using the plugin API.
